user.title: Netatmo Configuration
user.description:
Enter your Netatmo API credentials from [dev.netatmo.com](https://dev.netatmo.com/apps).

**Important:** Set the Redirect URI in your Netatmo app to:
`{external_url}/auth/external/callback`

data_description.external_url: Your Home Assistant external URL (e.g., https://ha.example.com)

auth.title: Authorize Netatmo
auth.description:
**Step 1:** Click this link to authorize:
[Authorize Netatmo]({auth_url})

**Step 2:** After authorizing, you'll be redirected to:
`{callback_url}?code=XXXXX`

**Step 3:** Copy the `code` value from the URL and paste it below:

data_description.auth_code: The code from the redirect URL (after ?code=)

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Netatmo
reauth_confirm.description: The Netatmo integration needs to be re-authenticated. Click Submit to continue.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid authorization code. Make sure you copied the full code and try again.
